Player History
Drafted in 22nd round, 338th overall pick, by Atlanta in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/7/2015, off David Chien (SF)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/15/2015, off Carlos Rivero (SF)...
Injured on 8/22/2015 with a Jammed Finger, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis (B) on 2/7/2016 to a 3-year deal worth $2,955,000 per year...
